title: Gildan Adult DryBlend Workwear T-Shirts with Pocket, 2-Pack
description: Shoulder to shoulder neck tape for durability
Double-needle pocket, sleeve, and bottom hems

On the jobsite or at the game, if staying dry and comfortable is the goal, then the DryBlend® Men’s Workwear Tee has your name on it. Made of a soft and smooth decorator-friendly 50% cotton/50% Polyester moisture-wicking blend, and featuring odor control technology, after one feel of this timeless pocketed tee you’ll wonder where it’s been your whole life.
